NO_CONSTRAINT - Static variable in interface ml.alternet.scan.NumberConstraint
When there is no constraint, there is no stop condition (that always return true).
NumberClassConstraint() - Constructor for class ml.alternet.scan.NumberConstraint.NumberClassConstraint
 
NumberConstraint - Interface in ml.alternet.scan
A number constraint is used by scanners to read numbers under conditions, such as limiting the number of total digits to read, or accepting negative numbers, forcing a number to be an integer, etc.
NumberConstraint.NumberClassConstraint - Class in ml.alternet.scan
Base class for checking constraints on number types.
NumberConstraint.Type - Class in ml.alternet.scan
A constraint on numbers : after parsing the number, it will be of the type given.

StringConstraint - Interface in ml.alternet.scan
A string constraint is used by scanners to read strings under conditions, such as limiting the number of characters to read, or stop reading when a whitespace is encountered.
StringConstraint.ReadLength - Class in ml.alternet.scan
A string constraint that reads the characters until the given length.

A string constraint that reads the characters until a char is encountered.

A string constraint that reads the characters until a char is encountered.
StringConstraint.ReadUntilString - Class in ml.alternet.scan
A string constraint that reads the characters until a string is encountered.
